title: Shadowflame Bow
summaries: The Shadowflame Bow is a Hardmode bow which has a 16.67*1/6 (16.67%) / 33.33*1/3 (33.33%) chance to drop from the Goblin Warlock during a Hardmode Goblin Army. It turns any type of arrow into special [img:Shadowflame Arrow]Shadowflame Arrows, which inflict the Shadowflame debuff on hit.

The Shadowflame Arrows fired will fly relatively slowly, but have an extremely high arc compared to most arrows, and may seem at first to be unaffected by <linked>gravity</linked> at all. If fired directly upwards, Shadowflame Arrows can travel 250 tiles skyward before beginning their descent, taking approximately 12 seconds from firing to fall back down to the player's position. They pierce up to two <linked>enemies</linked>, dissipating on the third hit.
